channel.title: This Weapon on That Enemy
channel.description:
Okay, I had just played through Half-Life and OpFor recently and experimented with the different weapons on certain enemies. Now if were possible, I would use the Gluon Gun for every scenario, but there's a scarcity of ammo.
I found alien weapons such as Hivehand and Shockroach to be horrible against there users. Other than that the Shockroach is extremely effective on other aliens and grunts. Hivehand sucks, hands down. Best alien weapon would be the Spore Launcher. Great for every situation. In HL1, Snarks were the best weapon for handling grunts when I had low health. Perfect distraction for me to get past them all.
So peeps, post your preferred weapons and selections for handling certain enemies.

item.title: This Weapon on That Enemy
item.dc:creator: awsgames
item.description:
HL1
Headcrab-Pistol/Shotgun
Zombie-Shotgun
Houndeye-Pistol
Bullsquid-Shotgun/Mp5
Vort-Magnum/Shotgun
Barnacle-Shotgun/Crowbar
Hgrunt-Magnum/Crossbow/Tau Cannon/Mp5
Tentacle-Rocket engine
Garg-Generator/Mortars/Rocket launcher, Tau Cannon, Mp5 grenade,Satchel charges, and Tripmines
Agrunt-Magnum/Crossbow/Mp5 grenade/Gluon
Snark- Mp5
Controller-Ignore
Baby Headcrab-Shotgun
Gonarch-All my shotgun and mp5 ammo
Nihilanth-Gluon and rocket launcher

HL2
CP-Pistol
Soldier-Smg/Shotgun/Ar2/Gravy gun
Elite- Magnum/Shotgun/Ar2/Gravy gun
Headcrab-Crowbar/Gravy gun
Zombie-Shotgun/Gravy gun
Fast Headcrab-Crowbar
Fast Zombie-Shotgun
Poison Headcrab-Whichever gun I’m holding at the moment
Posion Zombie-Ar2 ball
Antlion-Shotgun/Buggy Tau cannon
Antlion Guard-Ar2/Shotgun/Smg grenade/Rocket launcher
Manhack-Crowbar/Smg
Strider-Smg grenade/Ar2 ball/Rocket launcher
Gunship-Rocket launcher/Smg grenade

Read full topic

item.title: This Weapon on That Enemy
item.dc:creator: NickAVV
item.description:
Pyro:

I use the crossbow most of the time, actually.
It actually fills the same general role as the Pulse Rifle, in case you didn’t know.

I would think the crossbow fills the same general role as the… crossbow. But that’s just me.

item.title: This Weapon on That Enemy
item.dc:creator: Octocat
item.description:
Headcrab - Crowbar
Zombie - Crowbar
Houndeye - Pistol/Shotgun
Vortigaunt - Shotgun/MP5
Bullsquid - Shotgun
Soldier - MP5
Controller - Shotgun/Pistol
Female Assassin - MP5
Ichthyosaur - Crossbow, duh.
Vehicles - Grenades/RPG

I always try to complete the game with just crowbar, pistol, shotgun, and SMG, unless I need to use a specific weapon, such as RPG for tanks, or crossbow for the ichy.
